alert.note: Alert for St. Francois; Ste. Genevieve (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 2:26AM CST until February 16 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CST FOR WEST CENTRAL STE. GENEVIEVE AND WESTERN ST. FRANCOIS COUNTIES... At 226 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Park Hills, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bonne Terre. This also includes St. Joe State Park, St. Francois State Park, and Missouri Mines Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
